page.title: 13Leisure Facilities
page.content:
The facilities for out of school leisure activities in the area are limited. The main attraction for local children seems to be the Wednesday Club which is for seven to eleven year olds. It is run once a week at East Herts. College. It attracts between seventy and eighty children each week. They play snooker, darts, rounders and other games. There is also a Youth Club for under 18s. Another popular activity is swimming at the Broxbourne Lido. There are organized groups for Juniors at the local tennis and sailing clubs. The usual cub, brownie, scout, guide, boys and girls brigade groups meet once a week.
Fishing is popular on the River Lea.
